name: Kloudless
description: Kloudless connects the enterprise cloud and controls the data workflow across SaaS applications. We think content silos suck. Interconnected clouds are the future!Today, Kloudless is a simple, secure way to move attachments between Gmail/Outlook and other applications, ranging from cloud storage services to project management and CRM tools.
